channel.title: Downloading selection
channel.description: I wanted to know if there was a software which lets you select which files you want to download that are inside a rar or zip file. Right now i am using internet download manager but it downloads the whole thing. eg. i was looking for a key for kaspersky internet security and there was a rar file that had the kaspersky setup and the key. but i already have kaspersky installed and i just wanted the key. So is there something that lets you download a single file instead of the whole pack?

item.title: Downloading selection
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

if you use a torrent, or know how to find things, yea, you can only download the files you need

Read full topic
